files.description: Setup file for Quran Secrets package. Contains configuration details for packaging and installation of the Quran Secrets application.
List of python package dependencies required by the Quran Secrets application. Contains camel_tools package.
Initialization file for quran_secrets package, used to mark the src directory as a Python package and perform any package-level initializations if required.

Main driver module for the Quran Secrets application. It orchestrates the entire analysis workflow by importing and utilizing various analysis modules. The module reads Quran text, preprocesses it, and performs multiple types of analyses including word frequency, root words, bigrams, verse repetitions, palindromes, abjad numerals, semantic symmetry, verse length symmetry, lemmas, surah verse counts, and Muqatta'at analysis. Results are logged and a comprehensive final report is generated.

functions.name: main
functions.description: Main entry point for the Quran Secrets analysis. This function coordinates the entire analysis workflow: reading the Quran text file, preprocessing the text, executing various analysis functions, logging results, and generating a comprehensive final report. It handles file reading errors and writes the final report to a text file.

files.description: Module for reading the Quran text from a file. Contains a function to open a file and return its contents, or raise an IOError if the file cannot be read.

functions.name: read_quran_text
functions.description: Read and return the text from the specified Quran file. Raises an IOError if the file cannot be read.

parameters.name: file_path
parameters.description: The path to the Quran text file.

files.description: This module provides functionality for preprocessing and normalizing Arabic text. It includes functions to remove diacritics and normalize specific Arabic letters according to certain rules. The module is designed to standardize Arabic text for further processing in NLP or text analysis applications.

functions.name: remove_diacritics
functions.description: Removes all Arabic diacritical marks (tashkeel) from the input text. These marks include fatha, kasra, damma, sukun, shadda, and other vowel marks that appear above or below letters in Arabic script. The function uses regular expressions to identify and remove these marks.

parameters.name: text
parameters.description: The original Arabic text containing diacritics that need to be removed.

functions.name: normalize_arabic_letters
functions.description: Normalizes specific Arabic letters in the given text according to contextual rules. It specifically handles two cases: 1) Converting the Arabic letter 'ى' (alef maqsura, U+0649) to 'ي' (yeh, U+064A) only when it appears as a standalone word, and 2) Converting the Arabic letter 'ة' (teh marbuta, U+0629) to 'ه' (heh, U+0647) when it appears at the end of words. This normalization helps standardize text variations that are semantically equivalent in Arabic.

parameters.name: text
parameters.description: The Arabic text to be normalized.

files.description: Module for analyzing the Quran text for hidden patterns and anomalies. Contains various functions for text analysis, word frequency, root word extraction, verse repetition, numerical analysis (including Abjad calculations), Muqatta'at analysis, semantic symmetry, and other advanced analyses used in the Quran Secrets application.

functions.name: analyze_text
functions.description: Analyze the given text for hidden numerical patterns and anomalies. Simulates pattern detection on non-empty text to return anomaly messages.

parameters.name: text
parameters.description: The preprocessed text of the Quran to be analyzed.

functions.name: analyze_word_frequency
functions.description: Perform word frequency analysis on the preprocessed Quran text by tokenizing it, counting occurrences, summarizing top words, and flagging unusual frequencies.

functions.name: analyze_root_words
functions.description: Perform Arabic root word analysis using the CAMeL Tools morphological analyzer to extract and count root words from the Quran text.

functions.name: analyze_bigrams
functions.description: Generate n-grams (bigrams by default) from the tokenized text and count the frequency of each n-gram.

parameters.name: tokenized_text
parameters.description: A list of preprocessed tokens from the Quran text.

parameters.name: n
parameters.description: The number of words in each n-gram (default is 2 for bigrams).

functions.name: analyze_verse_repetitions
functions.description: Analyze verse repetitions within each Surah and across the Quran by identifying duplicate verses and their occurrences.

functions.name: analyze_lemmas
functions.description: Perform lemma analysis using CAMeL Tools to extract and count lemmas from the Quran text, returning a summary.

functions.name: analyze_surah_verse_counts
functions.description: Count the number of verses per Surah from the Quran text and generate a formatted summary.

parameters.name: text
parameters.description: The Quran text loaded from the data file.

functions.name: analyze_verse_lengths_distribution
functions.description: Analyze the distribution of verse lengths per Surah by calculating average word count and standard deviation, flagging surahs with consistent verse lengths.

parameters.name: text
parameters.description: The preprocessed Quran text, where each line represents a verse.

parameters.name: threshold
parameters.description: The standard deviation threshold to determine consistent verse lengths (default is 2).

functions.name: analyze_palindromes
functions.description: Identify and log palindromic words and phrases in each verse of the Quran.

functions.name: analyze_abjad_numerals
functions.description: Calculate the Abjad numerical sum for each verse, log notable numerical patterns such as multiples of 19 or 7, or prime sums.

functions.name: analyze_semantic_symmetry
functions.description: Evaluate semantic symmetry by comparing word overlap between two halves of each Surah.

functions.name: analyze_verse_length_symmetry
functions.description: Calculate average and standard deviation of verse lengths for two halves of each Surah and determine if they are symmetric.

parameters.name: text
parameters.description: The preprocessed Quran text, with each line representing a verse.

parameters.name: avg_threshold
parameters.description: Maximum allowed difference in average verse length between halves (default 1.0).

parameters.name: stddev_threshold
parameters.description: Maximum allowed difference in verse length standard deviation between halves (default 1.0).

functions.name: analyze_enhanced_semantic_symmetry
functions.description: Perform enhanced analysis of semantic symmetry using lemma overlap between halves of each Surah.

parameters.name: text
parameters.description: The preprocessed Quran text, with each line representing a verse.

parameters.name: symmetry_threshold
parameters.description: The minimum normalized overlap required to consider semantic symmetry (default 0.3).

functions.name: analyze_muqattaat
functions.description: Identify Surahs that begin with Muqatta'at, extract the mysterious letters and compute their frequency.

functions.name: analyze_muqattaat_positions
functions.description: Analyze the positional distribution of Muqatta'at within Surahs and categorize their positions (Beginning, Middle, End, or Throughout).

functions.name: analyze_muqattaat_sequences
functions.description: Extract sequences of Muqatta'at letters from the Quran text and count their frequency.

functions.name: analyze_muqattaat_numerical_values
functions.description: Perform numerical analysis of Muqatta'at using Abjad values by calculating individual and total letter sums and flagging notable patterns.

functions.name: analyze_correlations
functions.description: Integrate results from various analysis functions to identify correlations between textual and numerical patterns in the Quran.

parameters.name: flagged_words
parameters.description: List of flagged words from frequency analysis.

parameters.name: verse_length_diff_threshold
parameters.description: Threshold for average verse length difference (default is 2).

parameters.name: semantic_symmetry_diff_threshold
parameters.description: Threshold for semantic symmetry score difference (default is 0.1).

files.description: Module for logging analysis outputs of the Quran Secrets application. Provides functions to log secret findings, results, and bigram frequencies into a log file with timestamps.

functions.name: log_secret_found
functions.description: Logs a secret finding to the results.log file with a special tag and a timestamp.

functions.name: log_result
functions.description: Logs a result message to the results.log file with a timestamp.

functions.name: log_bigram_frequencies
functions.description: Logs the top N most frequent bigrams to the results log file including header and frequency counts for the top N bigrams.

parameters.name: bigram_frequencies
parameters.description: A dictionary mapping bigram tuples to frequency counts.

parameters.name: top_n
parameters.description: The number of top bigrams to log (default is 20).

files.description: Initialization file for tests directory to mark it as a package and perform any necessary test setup.
Unit tests for the file_reader module that test reading an existing file and handling errors for non-existing files.

classes.name: TestFileReader
classes.description: Unit test class for testing the file_reader module including tests for reading existing files and error handling when files do not exist.

methods.name: test_read_existing_file
methods.description: Test reading an existing file returns correct content.

methods.name: test_read_non_existing_file
methods.description: Test that reading a non-existing file raises an IOError.

files.description: Unit tests for the text_preprocessor module testing the removal of diacritics and normalization of Arabic letters.

classes.name: TestTextPreprocessor
classes.description: Unit test class for the text_preprocessor module, ensuring proper functionality of diacritics removal and Arabic letter normalization.

methods.name: test_remove_diacritics
methods.description: Test removal of Arabic diacritics from text.

methods.name: test_normalize_arabic_letters
methods.description: Test normalization of specific Arabic letters in text.

files.description: Unit tests for the analyzer module. This file contains the TestAnalyzer class that implements various unit tests for the functions in src.analyzer.

classes.name: TestAnalyzer
classes.description: A unittest.TestCase class containing unit tests for various functions in the src.analyzer module.

methods.name: setUp
methods.description: Setup test environment before each test.

methods.name: test_analyze_non_empty
methods.description: Test that a non-empty text returns a simulated anomaly.

methods.name: test_analyze_empty
methods.description: Test that an empty text returns no anomalies.

methods.name: test_analyze_word_frequency_summary
methods.description: Test that the word frequency analysis returns a proper summary and flagged list.

methods.name: test_analyze_word_frequency_with_flags
methods.description: Test that the word frequency analysis flags unusual word frequencies.

methods.name: test_analyze_root_words_empty
methods.description: Test Arabic root word analysis on empty text.

methods.name: test_analyze_root_words_sample
methods.description: Test Arabic root word analysis on sample text with mocked CAMeL Tools analyzer.

methods.name: test_analyze_bigrams_empty
methods.description: Test that analyze_bigrams returns an empty dictionary when provided an empty tokenized text or insufficient tokens.

methods.name: test_analyze_bigrams_sample
methods.description: Test analyze_bigrams with a sample tokenized text for correct bigram generation and frequency counting.

methods.name: test_analyze_palindromes_detects_palindrome
methods.description: Test that analyze_palindromes detects palindromic words and phrases.

methods.name: test_analyze_abjad_numerals_detects_patterns
methods.description: Test that analyze_abjad_numerals detects notable numerical patterns.

methods.name: test_analyze_semantic_symmetry_detects_symmetry
methods.description: Test that analyze_semantic_symmetry detects significant word overlap.

methods.name: test_analyze_verse_repetitions
methods.description: Test that analyze_verse_repetitions correctly identifies repetitions both intra-surah and across the Quran.

methods.name: test_analyze_verse_lengths_distribution
methods.description: Test that analyze_verse_lengths_distribution correctly calculates average verse length, standard deviation, and identifies consistent surahs.

methods.name: test_analyze_verse_length_symmetry_symmetry_detected
methods.description: Test that analyze_verse_length_symmetry detects symmetry when halves have similar verse lengths.

methods.name: test_analyze_verse_length_symmetry_non_symmetric
methods.description: Test that analyze_verse_length_symmetry returns non-symmetric when verse lengths differ significantly.

methods.name: test_analyze_enhanced_semantic_symmetry_symmetry_detected
methods.description: Test that analyze_enhanced_semantic_symmetry detects semantic symmetry when lemma overlap is high.

methods.name: test_analyze_enhanced_semantic_symmetry_low_symmetry
methods.description: Test that analyze_enhanced_semantic_symmetry returns low symmetry score when lemma overlap is minimal.

files.description: This file contains unit tests for the logger module. It tests the functionality of logging secret findings and general results. The tests use unittest framework with mocking to isolate the tests from actual file operations and datetime dependencies.

classes.name: TestLogger
classes.description: A test class that contains test cases for the logger module. It verifies that the logging functions correctly format and write messages to the log file.

methods.name: setUp
methods.description: Initializes the test environment by setting maxDiff to None to see full diff output in case of test failures.

methods.name: test_log_secret_found
methods.description: Tests that the log_secret_found function correctly formats and writes a message about a potential secret to the log file. It mocks the datetime and file operations to verify the exact output.

parameters.name: mock_datetime
parameters.description: Mocked datetime module to provide a fixed timestamp

parameters.name: mock_file
parameters.description: Mocked file open function to capture file writes

methods.name: test_log_result
methods.description: Tests that the log_result function correctly formats and writes a general result message to the log file. It mocks the datetime and file operations to verify the exact output.

parameters.name: mock_datetime
parameters.description: Mocked datetime module to provide a fixed timestamp

parameters.name: mock_file
parameters.description: Mocked file open function to capture file writes

files.description: Integration tests for the main module of the Quran Secrets application. It verifies end-to-end functionality of the application using unittest and mocks external dependencies.

classes.name: TestMainIntegration
classes.description: Test cases for end-to-end integration of the Quran Secrets application.

methods.name: setUp
methods.description: Set up the test fixture and maximum diff for assertions.

methods.name: test_main_integration_fallback
methods.description: Test the full execution of main() function end-to-end with CAMeL Tools fallback.

methods.name: test_main_integration_with_camel_tools
methods.description: Test the full execution of main() function end-to-end with CAMeL Tools available.

files.description: Text file containing the Quran text. This file is used as input for the analysis performed by the Quran Secrets application.
